data.persona: I am a young child from the community within the kingdom. I am a peasant and have no father. I live with the others.
data.description:
You are in the Dead Tree.
The dead tree is many, many decades old. It lies on its side, and is rotted through and through. It is blackened on its top. It is humongous. It would have been very, very tall once upon a time. It smells dank. It cannot be moved.
The rabbit is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the 4 leaf clover from the rabbit so that I have a bit of luck.
data.mid_motivation: I need to hunt the rabbit so that I can have something to eat.
data.long_motivation: I will learn to survive in the forest and make the Dead Tree my home.
